[vc_section css=”.vc_custom_1653990135284{margin-top: -30px !important;}”][vc_row video_bg=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1654626540192{margin-top: -80px !important;}” video_bg_url=”https://vimeo.com/337671312″][vc_column][vc_empty_space]

Video Animation Services

Tech Lab Steam is an animated video services company that aids businesses to distinguish their content and apprehend their marketing and social media appearance to the next level. We prioritize customers’ needs and create public-friendly animated videos that are appealing to the target audience. Our video animation services validate how your product/service is the answer to your target market’s needs and establish trustworthiness in your brand over competitors in just 60 seconds!

[vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space]

Our Portfolio

This is not our complete portfolio, contact us for further references

Contact Us
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
  • All
  • 3D Realistic
  • Production Animation
  • 2D Animation
  • 3D Animation
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Aniamtion Process

We breakdown our animation process in 7 simple steps

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1653991658341{margin-top: -30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}” effect=”fadeIn”][vc_column width=”1/3″]

1- Brief

To help you get the best out of your animation, we need to understand you better. We send you a short briefing document for you to fill. This is basically a quick questionnaire that lets us understand your company and your project.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

2- Script

The foundation of any great video is a creative and engaging story. Now that we have a good understanding of what you do, let’s turn it into a script that communicates your message and hits your target audience where it counts.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

3. Storyboard

After the script is signed off we’ll start to develop initial concept frames for your animation. Once you’re happy with the animation style we then create a full storyboard that details the visuals for the video scene-by-scene.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1653991658341{margin-top: -30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}” effect=”fadeIn”][vc_column width=”1/3″]

4. Voiceover

Your video needs to speak to people. And to do that, it needs the perfect voiceover. We have curated list of talent for your to choose from based on gender, age and regional accent.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

5. Animation

Here’s where everything takes shape. Once the script, storyboard and voiceover are signed off we get cracking with putting your animation together and adding music/SFX. Just sit back and relax!

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

6. Approval

We provide a link to the first edit where you will have the option to review it and provide any feedback. We allow unlimited rounds of amendments so don’t worry!

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1653991658341{margin-top: -30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}” effect=”fadeIn”][vc_column width=”1/3″]

7. Delivery

After we’ve made the final tweaks to your animation we’ll deliver it to you as an HD 1080p MP4 file, ready for download. If you need help figuring out where and how to host it then we’re happy to point you in the right direction!

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
